thread.section_title: Hotel Chandler - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location!
thread.title_full: Great location! - Review of Hotel Chandler, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: GHawkins84
title: Great location!
text: We stayed at the Chandler for two nights. It is located in a great area, especially if you're in the mood for Korean BBQ. Staff was friendly and helpful and the room was a nice size, bed was comfortable and had everything we needed. We would definitely recommend this hotel and will be returning here for future NYC trips!
